name: The Envolution Of Wandaland
description:
Hi, I am LIO, the main producer of this game. When I was a child, I was always fascinated by the "Guess Who I Am" segment in Pokémon cartoons. The ability to recognize different creatures just by their silhouettes was amazing! Even in real life, various shapes like a leaf or irregular tiles often sparked my imagination about monsters.
This game follows the same concept. In the world of Wandaland, you can collect a variety of creatures by unlocking different shapes.
All the creatures are formed by the division and combination of "cells". During gameplay, the focus is on observing the shapes rather than thinking.

Gameplay instructions: The red cells will not retain the intersecting parts, while the blue cells will behave in the opposite way. Right-click to toggle the colors.

Game content: Includes six scenes from the deep sea to outer space, with a total of 48 levels.
Total gameplay time: Approximately one hour.
Game features: Cute artwork and relaxing music.
If you are interested, thank you for purchasing! ❤️
****Due to the departure of the programmer, there will be no modifications or updates****
